description:
serial number 28449; dark wood stock and neck; inlaid, ornately carved metal on trigger housing, lock, trigger plate and neck; leather at end of butt; gothic face on underside of trigger housing; fantastic animals on trigger housing; inscriptions: brass, oval plate on underside of stock with "JKK"; "28449" below trigger housing; "HOLLAND & HOLLAND" on both sides of trigger plate; "MODELLE-DE-LUXE" on underside of trigger housing; "HOLLAND & HOLLAND .95. NEW BOND STREET, LONDON." and "WINNER OF ALL THE "FIELD" RIFLE TRIALS, LONDON", on either side of barrel; .a: sight removed for display. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
marks: brass, oval plate on underside of stock with \"JKK\"
title: English Breechloading, Double Express, Single-Shot Hunting Rifle
